name: 王謹誠
objective:
本課程介紹了流體力學。 它強調了應用於流體機械系統的基本工程科學原理。學生將學習粘性和非粘性流體的控制積分和微分方程，並將這些方程應用於內部和外部流動。
This course provides an introduction to fluid mechanics. It stresses fundamental engineering science principles applied to fluid mechanical systems. Students will learn the governing integral and differential equations for viscous and inviscid fluids and will apply these equations to internal and external flows.

第01週 CFD basics and ANSYS Fluent Introduction
第02週 Fundamental concepts
第03週 Pressure and fluid statics
第04週 Conservation equations and control-volume analysis
第05週 Conservation equations and control-volume analysis
第06週 Conservation equations and control-volume analysis
第07週 Differential analysis of fluid motion
第08週 Differential analysis of fluid motion
第09週 Midterm 期中考
第10週 Incompressible inviscid flow
第11週 Dimensional analysis and similarity
第12週 Dimensional analysis and similarity
第13週 Internal incompressible viscous flow
第14週 Internal incompressible viscous flow
第15週 External incompressible viscous flow
第16週 External incompressible viscous flow
第17週 Compressible flow
第18週 Final 期末考
